NETWORK_FETCH_FAILED.message: Network fetch failed or timed out.

URL_SCHEME_INSECURE.message: Insecure URL scheme (http) is not allowed for this context.

URL_HOSTNAME_MISMATCH.message: Hostname mismatch between request and expected issuer domain.

OIDC4VP_AUTHZ_MISSING.message: Authorization request is missing or invalid.

OIDC4VP_REQUEST_JWT_INVALID.message: Signed request JWT is invalid or malformed.

OIDC4VP_REQUEST_JWT_EXPIRED.message: Signed request JWT is expired or not yet valid.

OIDC4VP_REQUEST_JWT_SIG_INVALID.message: Signed request JWT signature verification failed.

OIDC4VP_ISS_CERT_MISMATCH.message: Issuer does not match certificate SAN (x5c) or allowed domains.

OIDC4VP_CT_BAD.message: request_uri response Content-Type must be application/oauth-authz-req+jwt.

OIDC4VP_REQUEST_URI_UNREACHABLE.message: request_uri is unreachable or returned an error.

OIDC4VP_AUTHZ_PLAIN_PARAMS.message: Authorization request passed via plain query params; signed request/request_uri recommended.

OIDC4VP_RESPONSE_TYPE_UNSUPPORTED.message: Unsupported or missing response_type for OIDC4VP.

OIDC4VP_RESPONSE_MODE_UNSUPPORTED.message: response_mode value is unsupported by profile or verifier.

OIDC4VP_CLIENT_ID_SCHEME_INVALID.message: client_id scheme not supported by profile.

OIDC4VP_REDIRECT_URI_MISSING.message: redirect_uri is missing in authorization request.

OIDC4VP_REDIRECT_URI_UNREGISTERED.message: redirect_uri not registered for this client_id.

OIDC4VP_NONCE_MISSING.message: nonce missing; replay protection may be weaker.

OIDC4VP_STATE_MISSING.message: state missing; CSRF protection may be weaker.

OIDC4VP_AUD_MISMATCH.message: aud claim does not match the wallet/relying party.

OIDC4VP_INPUT_DESCRIPTOR_MISSING.message: No input_descriptors found in Presentation Definition.

OIDC4VP_FORMATS_UNSUPPORTED.message: Requested VP/VC formats not supported by wallet profile.

OIDC4VP_CONSTRAINTS_INVALID.message: Constraints or fields filters are invalid or non-portable.

OIDC4VP_CLIENT_METADATA_MISSING.message: Client metadata not provided or could not be fetched.

OIDC4VP_CLIENT_METADATA_MISMATCH.message: Client metadata does not match request parameters.

OIDC4VP_DPOP_REQUIRED_MISSING.message: DPoP indicated by profile but not used in request/metadata.

OIDC4VP_TOK_BINDING_REQUIRED.message: Token binding/holder binding required by profile but not indicated.

OIDC4VCI_OFFER_MISSING.message: Credential offer is missing or invalid.

OIDC4VCI_OFFER_URI_UNREACHABLE.message: credential_offer_uri unreachable or returned an error.

OIDC4VCI_ISSUER_MISMATCH.message: Issuer in offer does not match issuer metadata.

OIDC4VCI_JWKS_MISSING.message: JWKS/JWKS URI missing in metadata; key discovery may fail.

OIDC4VCI_GRANT_MISSING.message: Grant details (e.g., pre-authorized code, authorization_code) are missing.

OIDC4VCI_PREAUTH_CODE_MISSING.message: pre-authorized_code grant selected but code missing in offer.

OIDC4VCI_USER_PIN_REQUIRED_MISSING.message: User PIN required by offer but not provided.

OIDC4VCI_AUTHZ_CODE_PARAMS_MISSING.message: Authorization Code flow missing PKCE or required parameters.

OIDC4VCI_CREDENTIAL_IDS_UNKNOWN.message: Unknown credential_configuration_ids in offer or metadata.

OIDC4VCI_FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED.message: Requested credential format not supported by profile.

OIDC4VCI_DISPLAY_MISSING.message: Display metadata missing; UX/localization may be degraded.

OIDC4VCI_LOCALE_UNSUPPORTED.message: Requested locale not supported by display metadata.

OIDC4VCI_PROOF_REQUIRED_MISSING.message: Issuer requires a proof (e.g., JWT/CNF) but none was provided.

OIDC4VCI_PROOF_TYPE_UNSUPPORTED.message: Proof type not supported by profile or issuer.

OIDC4VCI_ALG_UNSUPPORTED.message: Credential signature algorithm not supported by profile.

OIDC4VCI_ALG_MISMATCH_PROFILE.message: Algorithm allowed by issuer but not by selected profile.

OIDC4VCI_DPOP_REQUIRED_MISSING.message: DPoP required by issuer/profile but not indicated.

OIDC4VCI_SCOPE_MISSING.message: Token scope missing or empty for issuance.

OIDC4VCI_JTI_REPLAY_RISK.message: No unique jti in client proofs; replay risk possible.

OIDC4VCI_ENDPOINT_MISMATCH.message: Endpoints in metadata do not align with offer/authorization server metadata.

OIDC4VCI_AUTHZ_SERVER_MISSING.message: authorization_server metadata missing; dynamic discovery may fail.

OIDC4VCI_PROFILE_CONFLICT.message: Issuer configuration conflicts with selected ecosystem profile.
